group-list.description: This Group contains all the apis related to Seller Information

api-list.api-description: This api fetches the dashboard data like, Lifetime Sales, Average Order Amount, List of Latest Orders for the corresponding Seller.

api-params.description: This Parameter is required to filter the data by store
To check user logged or not
This parameter used for set image quality in terms sharpness and pixels per inch(ppi)
This parameter used for Set image demension

api-response.description: This denote whether the api results in success or failure. If false, then check the messgae key for the error message.
It contains either success or error message of the current api.
api-response.possible-values: Any success or error message, mostly error message.

api-response.description: It contains list of review of the seller.

explaination.description: Name of customer who writes the review.
It contains Rating of seller on price.
It contains Rating of seller on value.
It contains Rating of seller on quantity.

api-response.description: It contains Total amount paid by admin to the seler till date.
It is the remaining amount to be paid by admin to the seler till date.
It contains the Total worth of the products sold that belongs to that seller.
It contains url for category chart.
It contains recent list of Orders of the seller's products.
It contains graph Url of the statistics Graph on daily basis.
It contains graph Url of the statistics Graph on weekly basis.
It contains graph Url of the statistics Graph on monthly basis.
It contains graph Url of the statistics Graph on yearly basis.

it contains the daily sales report based on location
it contains the weekly sales report based on location
it contains the monthly sales report based on location
it contains the yealry sales report based on location

request-header-params.description: This is the digest created at client end using simple logic, ((apiKey+:+apiPassword)+token received from server when failed to authenticate)

response-header-params.description: Check for response code, if the response code is 401, then you need to check for this token key in response header. And utilise this to create authkey, that is going to be used in next request.

This is the name of the customer who is asking the query from the seller.
This is the email of the customer who is asking the query from the seller.

This is the id of the product about which the customer is having the query.

api-list.api-description: This API will be used to create a credit memo by the seller from the application.

api-params.description: This parameter will represent, whether to notify the customer with the comment or not.
This is the adjustment to be added in the amount of the credit memo.
This is the adjustment to be deducted in the amount of the credit memo.
This parameter will represent, whether to display the credit memo on frontend or not.
This is the shipping amount of the order for which the credit memo is created.
This is the increment Id corresponding the order for which the credit memo is being created.
This is the invoice Id corresponding the order for which the credit memo is being created.
This param represents whether to send email to the customer about the credit memo or not.
This param represents whether to credit memo online or off line.
This is the items data of the order for while the seller is creating the credit memo.
This param will contain the comment text by the seller while creating a credit memo.
To check user logged or not and to verify if the customer is a seller
This Parameter is required to filter the data by store
